guest.name: Seth Godin
guest.title: Author / Entrepreneur / Former Product Manager
guest.background: A legendary marketing expert and author of 21 best-selling books including 'Purple Cow' and 'This is Strategy'. He founded Yoyodyne and Squidoo and notably started his career as a Product Manager at Spinnaker Software.
guest.background_zh: 传奇营销大师，著有《紫牛》、《这就是战略》等21本畅销书。他是Yoyodyne和Squidoo的创始人，其职业生涯始于Spinnaker Software的产品经理职位。

episodeSummary: Seth Godin joins Lenny to discuss his new book 'This is Strategy' and his roots in product management. They explore why every great product strategy requires 'tension,' how to build a brand in the age of AI, and the four critical choices that define a product's destiny.
episodeSummary_zh: Seth Godin与Lenny探讨了他的新书《这就是战略》及其产品经理生涯的根源。他们深入讨论了为什么伟大的产品战略都需要“张力”，如何在AI时代建立品牌，以及决定产品命运的四个关键选择。
